articles.author: Rebecca Tan
articles.title: Hun Sen, Asia's longest-ruling leader, to step down, names son successor - The Washington Post
articles.description: Hun Sen’s resignation marks the end of a nearly four-decade rule in which he dismantled Cambodia’s opposition and brokered closer relations with China.
articles.content:

articles.title: Two supermoons to light up Singapore's skies in August - asianews.network
articles.description: A supermoon is a full moon that orbits closest to Earth, making it appear larger and brighter than usual.
articles.content:
July 26, 2023
SINGAPORE Singapores stargazers will be rewarded with not one, but two sightings of the supermoon in August.
